_sText:
Very similar to the previous map, ka_soccer_2008_v5: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/57381 What's new is that the scoreboard now shows periods, the teams on the scoreboard use a-z characters so you no longer have to make separate textures and set skins for teams. And Hadoken from ACSSL has made a radar overview for the map. Commands: Type these commands in chat to perform certain actions with the autoref script. !ref -- Brings up a referee menu to control manual aspects of the ref script. you must be set as an admin in the autoref config for !ref and !setteams.
!setteams [team1here] [team2here] -- Set teams for the ref script. Use underscores for spaces. For the newer scoreboards since 2008_v6, use full-stops to center the team. In addition to the map and map customizing scripts, you can optionally install my soccer (gameplay) scripts, available here: http://addons.eventscripts.com/addons/view/soccer They work for every setting different league/clans use. Extremely customisable. they record personal player stats (viewable in-game and on a webserver), Limit knives-per-minute, Disable knifing, Control health/god-mode options (including a commbox-as-bloodbin script), Automatically referee (for clan/league matches), Control an in-game scoreboard, Slay people jumping on goals, Set separate skins for goalies and teams, Allows sprinting, And automatically load the scripts upon changing to a soccer map.
